verses.text: TĀ ko e koto lelei ‘a e tō‘onga ‘a e ‘Otua ki ‘Isileli, Kiate kinautolu ‘oku ma‘a honau ‘atamai.
Ka ko au na‘e toe si‘i ke humu hoku va‘e; Ko ‘eku laka na‘e meimei ko e koto tatele.
He na‘a ku meheka ki he kau fakamālohi, ‘Eku sio ki he tu‘umālie ‘a e ha‘a fai kovi.
He hangē ‘oku ‘ikai ke ha‘isia kinautolu: Pea ‘oku fefeka ai pē honau ngū.
‘Oku ‘ikai te nau mo‘ua ‘i he ongosia ‘o ha‘a vaivai; Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ke te‘ia kinautolu ‘o hangē ko ha‘a mālohi.
Ko ia ai, ‘oku nau kahoa ‘aki ‘a e fielahi; ‘Oku nau kofu ‘aki ‘a e fakamālohi.
Ko honau mata kuo poko he fu‘u sino: ‘Oku pā ki tu‘a ‘a e fu‘u fakakaukau ‘a honau loto.
‘Oku nau mata hihiki, ‘oku nau lea kovi, ‘Oku nau futa ‘aki ‘enau mā‘olunga he lau fakamālohi:
Kuo nau ‘ai honau ngutu ‘i he langi, Pea hā‘ele atu honau ‘elelo ‘i māmani.
Ko ia ai, ‘oku tafoki hono kakai ‘o muimui ki ai: Ko ‘enau fie inu ha vai lahi.
Pea ‘oku nau lau, “‘O ‘ilo fēfē ‘a ‘Ela? Pea ko ‘Elioni, ‘oku ne mea‘i koā?
Vakai, ko e kau angahala kinautolu na, Ka ‘oku nau tu‘umālie ai pē, ‘o fakalahi koloa.”
Tā ko e kulanoa ‘eku toutou tafi hoku loto ke ma‘a, Mo ‘eku fanofano hoku nima ‘i he ta‘eangahala;
He ‘oku fai hoku taa‘i ‘i he ‘aho kotoa, Pea ko e pongipongi fuli pē ‘oku fai hoku tautea.
Ka ne u tu‘utu‘uni ke pehē ‘eku lau, Tā te u fai hala ki he to‘utangata ‘o ho‘o fānau.
Pea ka u ka fakalaulauloto ke ‘ilo hono ‘uhinga, Ko e kavenga leva ki hoku mata.
Kae‘oua Kuo u hū ki he ngaahi potu tapu ‘o ‘Ela, ‘O sio ki honau iku‘anga.
Tā ‘oku ke ‘ai kinautolu ki he ngaahi potu ‘oku hekengofua: ‘Oku ke tulaki kinautolu ki he fu‘u ‘auha.
Hono ko e kemo kuo nau hoko ko e koto lusa! Kuo kai ‘o ‘osi kinautolu ‘e he ‘ū ilifia.
Hangē ha misi ‘oka ‘ā ha taha, Pehē, ‘e ‘Ātonai, ‘i ho‘o ofo hake na, Te ke ta‘etoka‘i kinautolu, he ko e ‘ata‘i me‘a.
He ko hoku loto na‘e toka konā, Pea ko hoku kofuua na‘e hangē kuo hoka:
‘Io, kuo pehē ‘eku vale mo masiva ‘ilo; Ne u hoko ko e manu tofu pē ‘i ho ‘ao.
Ka ko e “Ko au” ko ia ‘oku ta fe‘ao ma‘u: Kuo ke puke hoku to‘omata‘u.
Te ke fale‘i au, ‘o taki hala, Pea hili ia te ke tali fakahū au ki he kolōlia.
Ko hai mo koe ‘oku ou ma‘u ‘i langi? Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘aku toe manako ‘i māmani.
Ko hoku kakano mo hoku loto kuo ‘autalua; Ka ko e ‘Otua ‘a e mālohinga ‘o hoku loto, Mo hoku tofi‘a ‘o ta‘engata.
He vakai ‘e mole ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakamama‘o meiate koe: Kuo ke faka‘auha ‘a kinautolu ‘oku kumi husepāniti kehe.
Ka ‘oku lelei kiate au ke fakaofiofi ki he ‘Otua: Kuo tu‘u ‘eku hūfanga ‘ia ‘Ātonai Sihova, Ke u ‘a‘au ho‘o ngaahi ngāue kotoa.
